          <title>
            <string language="en">Igneous rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eruptivgesteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roches plutoniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rochas igneous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rocce eruttive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πύρινοι βράχοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rocas ígneas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows igneous rocks like basalt and granite. When molten materials from volcanoes are cooled down, these igneous rocks are formed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volcano</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Eruptivgesteine wie Basalt 
und Granit. Wenn flüssige Materialien von den Vulkanen unten 
abgekühlt werden, werden diese Eruptivgesteine gebildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les roches plutoniques 
comme le basalte et le granit. Quand des matériaux fondus des 
volcans sont refroidis, ces roches plutoniques sont formées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra rochas igneous como o 
basalt e o granito. Quando os materiais derretidos dos vulcões 
são refrigerados para baixo, estas rochas igneous estão dadas forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le rocce eruttive come
il basalto ed il granito. Quando i materiali fusi dai vulcani 
sono raffreddati, queste rocce eruttive sono formate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πύρινους βράχους όπως το
βασάλτη και το γρανίτη. Όταν τα λειωμένα υλικά από τα 
ηφαίστεια δροσίζονται κάτω, αυτοί οι πύρινοι βράχοι 
διαμορφώνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra rocas ígneas como el 
basalto y el granito. Cuando los materiales fundidos de los 
volcanes se refrescan abajo, se forman estas rocas ígneas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
